S

Server - Class in net.c0nan.dhs.cs.server
The class Server extends Thread implements IServer has a threaded method to avoid hanging up the VM and listens for connection on the set port, which will receive a file path which calls the fileHelper to get the file content and streams the content back to the client over the network connection.
Server() - Constructor for class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.server.Server
 
Server(Integer) - Constructor for class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.server.Server
Constructs an NetworkClient
ServerBuilder - Class in net.c0nan.dhs.cs.factory
The class ServerBuilder uses the builder pattern to generate the Server
ServerBuilder() - Constructor for class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.factory.ServerBuilder
 
ServerMain - Class in net.c0nan.dhs.cs
The class ServerMain defines the execution point for the server
ServerMain() - Constructor for class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.ServerMain
 
ServerTest - Class in net.c0nan.dhs.cs.tests
The class ServerTest is the junit test for the server
ServerTest() - Constructor for class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.tests.ServerTest
 
setOut() - Method in class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.client.impl.AbstractClient
Redirects the System.out to an output defined in the Common Library
setPort(Integer) - Method in class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.dto.ConnectionDto
 
setServerAddress(String) - Method in class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.dto.ConnectionDto
 
setupConnection() - Method in class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.factory.ServerBuilder
Gets the connection details from the PropertiesHelper throws PropertiesException and IOException
setupServer() - Method in class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.factory.ServerBuilder
Creates the Server and loads the port info throws PropertiesException and IOException
StandaloneClient - Class in net.c0nan.dhs.cs.client.impl
The class StandaloneClient extends AbstractClient and uses Server to read the contents of a file this class sends a file path to the Server and receives the content of the file and outputs it to System.out
StandaloneClient(String) - Constructor for class net.c0nan.dhs.cs.client.impl.StandaloneClient
Constructs an StandaloneClient
